title: Spot the font : neutra like ?
content:
This morning i’m goin mad, i’m tryin to remember the name of a font btu can’t.

It’s looks like Neutra, but more ’feminine’, with longers legs…

Any idea ???
author: nlx

comments.content:
That _does_ look like Neutraface to me.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20091115190917im_/http:/typophile.com/files/NEUTRARE_6311.jpg)
